lines.i: The number of fetuses delivered live or dead at any time in the pregnancy regardless of gestational age or if the fetuses were delivered at different dates in the pregnancy.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.41"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:340)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:342)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:341)/@code="57722-1" Birth plurality (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it records the plurality of the delivery.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:343)
A measure of the plurality of the pregnancy.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:340)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:342)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:341)/@code="57722-1" Birth plurality (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it records the plurality of the delivery.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:343)
A measure of the plurality of the pregnancy.
